args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: https://nypost.com/2024/08/15/us-news/nearly-three-quarters-of-americans-believe-kamala-harris-knew-about-bidens-mental-decline-poll/
https://links.truthsocial.com/link/112969706408559645
Nearly three-quarters of Americans believe Kamala Harris knew about Biden’s mental decline: poll 
The Fox News survey, released Thursday, found that 73% of voters feel Harris knew the 81-year-old president had been in decline for the last couple of years.
